column4: hi all, i've installed hoary but cant get to install gstreamer0.8-mad (yes, i added universe to apt sources). any idea? i got a msg about libid3tag0 and libmad0 not installable
gstreamer0.8-mad depends on libid3tag0 (>=0.15.0b) but not installable (that's the rough translation, the msg is in italian)
if you can't find any info on a repository that has it, but you find a .deb file, you can just install it manually
